xmlText.p: First Period_1, New Jersey, Palmieri 10 (Zacha, Hall), 3:42 (pp). 2, Philadelphia, Giroux 15 (Voracek, Simmonds), 6:47 (pp). 3, New Jersey, Stafford 8 (Vatanen, Moore), 13:49 (pp). 4, Philadelphia, Simmonds 17 (Voracek, Gostisbehere), 15:46 (pp).
